api_list.api_description: Retrieve information about specific 'thing' items such as board games or other types.

required_parameters.name: ids
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of thing IDs to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by thing types like boardgame, expansion, accessory etc.

api_list.api_description: Fetch a random dad joke in the specified format.

optional_parameters.name: accept
optional_parameters.description: The format to accept the joke in.

query: Can you tell me some details about the board game with ID 174430 and also give me a random dad joke?
